channel.title: Learning what instuments can do
channel.description: Hey guys! This topic will be used for others to learn just exactly what intruments and their sounds can do. Like for example alot of people dont know what "hats" can do for a drum. Someone here can explain that. So if someone wants to learn anything about any instrument auxy has to offer, ask it here. So keep it positive and keep ona rockin!

item.title: Learning what instuments can do
item.dc:creator: InfinityBeatz
item.description:
Ok thank you everyone! Now if there are any other things that people might not know and need explaining just post it here! Keep it positive, simple, and Keep ona Rockin!

Read full topic

item.title: Learning what instuments can do
item.dc:creator: Produk
item.description:
The “Hats” dial in an instrument changes the volume of the hi-hats.

item.description:
Hats make the song sound complete and fill in the empty spaces pretty much. Percussion is one of the most important thing in music

item.title: Learning what instuments can do
item.dc:creator: Db909
item.description:
en.m.wikipedia.org

Drum kit

A drum kit — also called a drum set, trap set (an abbreviation of the word, "contraption"), or simply drums — is a collection of drums and other percussion instruments, typically cymbals, which are set up on stands to be played by a single player, with drumsticks held in both hands, and the feet operating pedals that control the hi-hat cymbal and the beater for the bass drum. A drum kit consists of a mix of drums (categorized classically as membranophones, Hornbostel-Sachs high-level classi A s...

Read full topic

item.title: Learning what instuments can do
item.dc:creator: InfinityBeatz
item.description:
Yes but what is hats in general. What does it do to the drum. This is confusing for alot of people. And thank you im sure you can come in handy for some people. (Such as myself)

Read full topic

item.title: Learning what instuments can do
item.dc:creator: _undefined
item.description:
Hey, so I can explain what most of these sounds can do, so if you have any questions, just ask!!

BTW the hats change the “hats” volume, not the filter.
